T02D3597:224a-1: badzra shri kham l'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3597:224a-3: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3597:224a-4: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo /
T02D3597:224b-0: @224b sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas /
T02D3597:224b-1: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um yig ljang
T02D3597:224b-2: gu'i yi ge las skyes pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog
T02D3597:224b-3: ma zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
T02D3597:224b-4: sngon po dang dkar po ni g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
T02D3597:224b-5: zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa rdo rje dang /
T02D3597:224b-6: rdo rje lcags sgrog dang mda' rnams g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
T02D3597:224b-9: gzhu rnams ni g-yon gyi phyag gsum na'o //
T02D3597:224b-10: sku mdog ljang ser zhal cung zad bzhad pa /
T02D3597:224b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3597:224b-12: gdug pa can gyi sems can rnams 'dul ba'i bdag nyid du bsams la phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D3597:224b-13: de la lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcings
T02D3597:224b-14: te mtheb chung dang sdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi
T02D3597:224b-15: rnam par can du bcing bar bya ba ni rdo
T02D3597:224b-16: rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3597:224b-17: aom badzra shr'i kham le h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni bzlas pa'o //
